attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
these are some of our points that we think should be put into action...
*Smaller shops(local produce, fresh)
*No burning coals, gas, ect.(fossil fuels) 
* use  less man made products like plastic rubber ect.
*Use greener energy resourse( wind turbines, wave power geo-thermal ect.)
(I am afraid to say you are trying to help the enviroment by makeing turbines but its not happening that quickly that it will be left to our generation to sort it out. HELP US NOW INSTEAD OF RUENING OUR LIVES!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
